geneVariantDescriptions.description: RYR1 mutant indicates an unspecified mutation in the RYR1 gene.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a meta-analysis, RYR1 mutations were associated with improved response to treatment with immune checkpoint inhibitors including Opdivo (nivolumab), Yervoy (ipilimumab), and Keytruda (pembrolizumab) in non-small cell lung cancer patients, as indicated by enrichment in the durable clinical benefit group (12/51, 24% vs 2/55, 4%, p<0.001) compared to the no durable benefit group (PMID: 31290993).

references.title: Association of Survival and Immune-Related Biomarkers With Immunotherapy in Patients With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer: A Meta-analysis and Individual Patient-Level Analysis.
